knimeNode.name: h-dome Extraction
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extract regions of height h from an image.

fullDescription.intro:
Extract regions of height h from an image.
Contributed by INCIDE, University of Konstanz

tab.name: options
tab.option: Use a four or eight connected grid.

option.name: Subtract domes of height before extraction

tab.option: This option controls wether domes of height x should be subtracted from the image before the domes of height h are extracted. This can be used if you are searching markers for e.g. watershedding, when there are multiple small domes of height x close together that should be joined into a plateau.
The height of the domes to extract.
